name: Optimum Link
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
